meanings.definition: A bitter glucoside found in willow bark and other plants, used as an analgesic and antipyretic.
meanings.sent1: The salicins in willow bark help reduce pain and fever.
meanings.sent2: Doctors sometimes prescribe medications containing salicins for pain relief.
meanings.sent3: The bitter taste of salicins in plants makes them unpopular among insects.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was as strong as the bitterness of salicins.
meanings.sent5: The medicinal properties of salicins are truly remarkable.
